objects.text:
• Bohemian design with scalloped patterns
• Premium leather with artisanal stitching
• Padded insole with light blue lining
• Durable bubble-textured outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
This banner presents a lifestyle sneaker product in a clean, geometric layout segmented into four quadrants using soft diagonal grid lines for visual symmetry. The top-left quadrant houses a bold 2-line headline (id: "heading") in earthy brown typography, paired with a smaller subheading (id: "subheading") in a sleek font. The product image (id: "product_image") is centrally placed, overlapping both top-right and bottom-right quadrants for dynamic emphasis. The lower left features a bullet-point list (id: "description") highlighting key product features in white text. A bold price tag (id: "price") is also prominently displayed. The bottom-right quadrant contains a limited-time offer tagline (id: "tagline") paired with a dark brown rectangular call-to-action button (id: "cta_background") labeled by "cta".

**Color Palette:**
- Background Beige: `#F5EDE2`
- Light Tan: `#E8DBC9`
- Sandy Brown: `#D0B38B`
- Terracotta Orange: `#C18A54`
- Soft Peach: `#E8C09E`
- Earthy Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Accent Tan: `#A67C52`
- Light Circle Beige: `#E0C9A6`
- Highlighted Circle Orange: `#D4A76A`
- White (Text and Dots): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively designed sneaker in a warm, food-inspired color scheme that blends various shades of orange, beige, and brown. The base color is a creamy beige (#F3D6B2), enriched with warm mid-tones like caramel brown (#C56A27) on the laces and trim. Accents of deep rust orange (#A8431C) highlight the stitching and decorative overlays, adding depth and visual interest. The shoe also features soft light tan (#F5E1C6) and muted clay (#D98E63) tones, creating elegant seamless transitions across textures. The palette evokes warmth and comfort, perfect for an advertisement banner that emphasizes artisan craftsmanship and stylish uniqueness.
